entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
